sense.gloss: second (of three, e.g. sons, volumes), middle
while (e.g. one is young), during, within (e.g. a day), in the course of
in (secret, chaos, poverty, etc.), amidst, with (e.g. success)
within oneself, one's feelings, inner thoughts
my spouse, my husband, my wife
signed on behalf of (husband's name) by his wife
in, within, out of (e.g. ten people), among
during, while, in (the course of), within (a period), throughout
currently (doing), in the process of, in the middle of, under (e.g. construction, investigation)
(all) through (e.g. the night), throughout (e.g. the year), all ... long
within (e.g. the week), in the course of (e.g. today), by the end of
all (of a group), the whole (family, school, etc.)
Chūgoku region (western part of Honshu comprising the prefectures of Okayama, Hiroshima, Yamaguchi, Tottori and Shimane)
central part of a country, main region
province of the second lowest rank (ritsuryō system)
center, centre, middle, heart, core, focus, pivot, emphasis, balance
in the middle of, midway, halfway
concentration (on a task), focusing one's attention
concentration (of population, buildings, power, etc.), centralization, convergence, focus (of a debate, questions, etc.)

sdata.j: 「↑洞穴↑↓ほらあな↓の↑中↑↓なか↓で↑何↑↓なに↓が↑起↑↓お↓こっているんだろう？すごく↑知↑↓し↓りたいなあ」「↑見当↑↓けんとう↓もつかないよ」
sdata.e: What's going on in the cave? I'm curious. "I have no idea."

sdata.j: ↑学校↑↓がっこう↓↑教育↑↓きょういく↓の↑義務↑↓ぎむ↓↑的↑↓てき↓↑側面↑↓そくめん↓は↑子↑↓こ↓どもの↑学習↑↓がくしゅう↓↑意欲↑↓いよく↓を↑改善↑↓かいぜん↓させる↑様々↑↓さまざま↓な↑研究↑↓けんきゅう↓の↑多↑↓おお↓くの↑取↑↓と↓り↑組↑↓く↓みの↑中↑↓なか↓ではめったに↑分析↑↓ぶんせき↓されない。
sdata.e: The mandatory character of schooling is rarely analyzed in the multitude of works dedicated to the study of the various ways to develop within children the desire to learn.

sdata.j: ↑世↑↓よ↓の↑中↑↓なか↓には10↑種類↑↓しゅるい↓の↑人間↑↓にんげん↓がいる。↑二進法↑↓にしんほう↓が↑分↑↓わ↓かる↑者↑↓もの↓と↑分↑↓わ↓からない↑者↑↓もの↓だ。
sdata.e: There are 10 types of people in the world: those who understand binary, and those who don't.

sdata.j: あなたは↑妊娠↑↓にんしん↓↑中絶↑↓ちゅうぜつ↓に↑賛成↑↓さんせい↓ですか、↑反対↑↓はんたい↓ですか。
sdata.e: Are you for or against abortions?

sdata.j: ↑食事↑↓しょくじ↓↑中↑↓ちゅう↓↑本↑↓ほん↓を↑読↑↓よ↓んだ。
sdata.e: I read a book while eating.

sdata.j: ↑先週↑↓せんしゅう↓↑中国語↑↓ちゅうごくご↓を↑習↑↓なら↓い↑始↑↓はじ↓めました。

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑常時↑↓じょうじ↓↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑才能↑↓さいのう↓をねたむ↑人々↑↓ひとびと↓から↑中傷↑↓ちゅうしょう↓されることにうんざりしていた。
sdata.e: He was sick of being vilified all the time by people who were jealous of his ability.

sdata.j: ↑夏休↑↓なつやす↓みの↑間↑↓あいだ↓、↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑夜中↑↓よなか↓に↑夕食↑↓ゆうしょく↓を↑食↑↓た↓べていた。
sdata.e: During summer breaks, I ate dinner at midnight.

sdata.j: ↑世界↑↓せかい↓は↑君↑↓きみ↓を↑中心↑↓ちゅうしん↓に↑回↑↓まわ↓っているわけではないんだよ。
sdata.e: The world doesn't revolve around you.
